shortdesc.ph: The video streams for the video mixing on the local client.

p.codeblock: export class TranscodingVideoStream { sourceType?: MediaSourceType remoteUserUid?: number imageUrl?: string x?: number y?: number width?: number height?: number zOrder?: number alpha?: number mirror?: boolean }

pd.p: The source type of video for the video mixing on the local client. See .
The ID of the remote user.Use this parameter only when the source type of the video for the video mixingonthe local client is .

The connection ID corresponding to the remote user.
Use this parameter only when the source type of the video for the video mixing onthe local client is .
If joining only one channel, set this parameter to the default value.
The URL of the image.Use this parameter only when the source type of the video for the video mixing on the local client is RTC_IMAGEimage.
The horizontal displacement of the top-left corner of the video for the video mixing on the client relative to the top-left corner (origin) of the canvas for this video mixing.
The vertical displacement of the top-left corner of the video for the video mixing on the client relative to the top-left corner (origin) of the canvas for this video mixing.
The width (px) of the video for the video mixing on the local client.
The height (px) of the video for the video mixing on the local client.

plentry.pd: The position and video size of the upper left corner of the video participating in the video mixing relative to the upper left corner (origin) of the composite image canvas. The type is CGRect.

The number of the layer to which the video for the video mixing on the local client belongs. The value range is [0,100].
0: (Default) The layer is at the bottom.
100: The layer is at the top.

pd.p: The transparency of the video for the video mixing on the local client. The value range is [0.0,1.0]. 0.0 means the transparency is completely transparent. 1.0 means the transparency is opaque.

plentry.pd:
Whether to mirror the video for the video mixing on the local client.
: Mirror the captured video.
: (Default) Do not mirror the captured video.
The paramter only works for videos with the source type CAMERACamera.
